title: Blog
description: A simple blog project inspired by jvns.ca. Articles are ordered by category, it support various HTML tag like <hr> all <hX> tags and much more. A editor is available at /editor; and a RSS feed available at /rss (also available as an Atom feed)

title: CinéBrest
description:
An instance of grainParis.art that centralized theater showtimes from Brest to a one-page
Both available on GitHub (see website footer)

title: LocaleAPI
description: This is an API for localizing strings in several languages, with the possibility for users to add their own languages.

title: Maintainer for OpenMC
description:
OpenMC is a collaborative Minecraft plugin available on GitHub
I participated in it (and became a maintainer)

Playable on play.openmc.fr

title: Babarcode
description:
Babarcode is an external program for Minecraft that allows you to play Minecraft using... a ✨barcode scanner✨.
It works by scanning barcodes that the reader will input as if it were a keyboard. The barcode is a number (like 01). The program will then read the code and perform the associated action.
